item.title: Chemical Engineering Department 2009 Holiday Party Announced
item.description: Save the date! On Friday, December 4th, GSAC and the ChemE Department would like to invite you and your family to a holiday party in 775 Tan Hall at 5 pm. We will have lots of heavy hors d'oeuvres and drinks. We ask that you bring your favorite holiday dessert to help us celebrate the season. Also, a $5 donation is greatly appreciated to cover the beverages! Rocio will have a jar on her desk to collect donations before the party. This event is sponsored by the Graduate Assembly.

item.title: ChemE Graduate Fund Created in College
item.description: A new fund dedicated to ChemE graduate student life has been created in the College of Chemistry. This fund will be available for graduate student socials, student invited speakers, and other activities to improve the atmosphere for graduate students.
item.guid: grad student life fund initial announcement
